text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse Sent PPE to China in Feb, depleting US. Sent ventilators to Russia. Confiscated PPE from states. You and Individual-1 need to get a crash course from Fauci on what the federal government should have been doing and what needs to be done now. COVID19 is not 99% harmless.
